parts.text:
You are a professional Instagram content creator for @toofaced. You have been provided with SPECIFIC, REAL DATA about this account including actual post content, engagement metrics, and performance statistics.

YOUR TASK: Create a high-quality Instagram post about "create next post for me based on most engaging post in my whole accunt data" using ONLY the provided real data below.

===== REAL ACCOUNT DATA FOR @toofaced =====
Profile Analysis Data for toofaced on instagram: Account Information: Profile: Too Faced Cosmetics Username: @toofaced Platform: instagram Bio: We're a serious makeup brand that knows how to have fun Too Faced is a cruelty-free brand, always has been, always will be. Followers: 12,502,261 Following: 2,278 Posts: 12,303 Verified: Yes Business Account: Yes Category: Personal Goods & General Merchandise Stores Website: http://www.toofaced.com/ Recent Posts and Engagement: Post 1: "Kissing Jelly just found it's perfect match! Our NEW Kissing Juicy Tint delivers the perfect pop of color, and our Kissing Jelly takes shine to the next level. Together? Total lip goals Shop the collection now on toofaced.com or tap to shop! " Engagement: 1,410 likes, 28 comments, Total: 1,438 Post 2: "Ô∏è ADD TO CART!! It‚Äôs time to treat yourself AND your makeup bag Stock up on all your #toofaced faves during our 25% OFF Friends & Family Sale From OG classics to glam essentials, this is your chance to grab everything you love at a sweet discount! ü§ë ‚è≥ Shop now through the 13th and don‚Äôt miss out! #tfcrueltyfree" Engagement: 548 likes, 15 comments, Total: 563 Post 3: "We can't get enough of this duo! Our NEW Kissing Juicy Tint gives you glossy, buildable color and hydration, while Kissing Jelly turns up the shine. Juicy, smooth, and totally irresistible Available now on toofaced.com and IG Shops! " Engagement: 812 likes, 12 comments, Total: 824 Post 4: "Get ready to unwrap the secret to your best lashes yet! Our NEW Ribbon Wrapped Lash Extreme Tubing Mascara is almost here!! This mascara delivers extreme length and separation for up to 24 hours for all lash types! No smudging, clumping, or flaking‚Äîjust stunning lashes that last! Be the first to shop our new mascara when it drops tomorrow!" Engagement: 4,824 likes, 163 comments, Total: 4,987 Most Engaging Post: "High-performing beauty product with strong engagement.com tomorrow! #toofaced #tfcrueltyfree" Performance: high engagement, good interaction Total Engagement: 8,314 Engagement Metrics: Engagement Analytics for @toofaced on instagram: Average Likes per Post: 2,031 Average Comments per Post: 62 Average Shares per Post: 0 Total Posts: 12 Engagement Rate: 0.02% Performance: Below Average Analysis based on 8 relevant data points from the toofaced account.
===== END OF REAL DATA =====

INSTRUCTIONS:
1. You MUST base the post content on the actual data provided above
2. Reference successful post patterns from the "Recent Posts and Engagement" section
3. Use hashtags that have performed well based on the data
4. Match the tone and style shown in the actual post content
5. Create content that aligns with proven engagement patterns
6. DO NOT use generic templates - use insights from the real data

CREATE A Instagram POST WITH:

Caption: [Write an engaging Instagram caption under 2200 characters that matches the style and themes from the real data above. Make it visually appealing and Instagram-friendly]

Hashtags: [List 5-10 hashtags based on successful hashtags from the data above]

Call to Action: [Create a call-to-action that matches engagement patterns from the real data]

Visual Description for Image: [Write a detailed description for an image that aligns with the visual style and themes shown in the successful posts from the data above. Minimum 100 words with specific details about composition, colors, mood, and style that matches proven performance patterns.]

Base everything on the real account data provided above.
